All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Provides generic methods for performing CRUD operations on database tables.
Bill
Represents a bill record for a purchase.
BillBLL
The BillBLL class serves as a business logic layer for managing bill-related operations.
BillDAO
The BillDAO class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations related to bills.
Client
Represents a client entity with attributes such as ID, name, address, email, and age.
ClientAgeValidator
 
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class represents the business logic layer for managing clients.
ClientDAO
Provides methods to perform CRUD operations on the Client table in the database.
ClientDeleteView
Represents the graphical user interface for deleting a client.
ClientEditIdSelectionPage
Represents the graphical user interface for selecting a client ID for editing.
ClientEditView
Represents the graphical user interface for editing client details.
ClientInsertView
Represents the graphical user interface for inserting new client details.
ClientOperationController
Controls the interaction between the presentation layer and the business logic layer for client-related operations.
ClientOperationView
Provides a graphical user interface for selecting different client operations.
ConnectionFactory
Provides methods for creating and managing database connections.
Controller
The Controller class serves as the main controller for the application, coordinating interactions between the user interface views and the business logic layers.
EmailValidator
 
OrderBLL
Business logic layer for managing order operations.
OrderCreateView
The OrderCreateView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for creating orders.
OrderDAO
Provides methods to perform CRUD operations on the Orders table in the database.
OrderOperationController
The OrderOperationController class handles the interaction between the OrderCreateView GUI and the business logic layer.
Orders
Represents an order entity with attributes such as order ID, client ID, product ID, and quantity.
OrderView
The OrderView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for managing orders.
Product
Represents a product entity with attributes such as product ID, price, name, and stock.
ProductBLL
Business logic layer for managing product operations.
ProductDAO
Provides methods to perform CRUD operations on the Product table in the database.
ProductDeleteView
The ProductDeleteView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for deleting a product.
ProductEditIdSelectionPage
The ProductEditIdSelectionPage class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for selecting a product ID to edit.
ProductEditView
The ProductEditView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for editing a product's details.
ProductInsertView
The ProductInsertView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for inserting a new product into the system.
ProductOperationController
The ProductOperationController class acts as a controller for managing product-related operations in the presentation layer.
ProductOperationView
The ProductOperationView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for selecting product operations.
Start
 
Validator<T>
 
View
The View class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the main page of the online shop.
